website_summaries.verdict: Evernote's Android app, now in version 5, has some exclusive new features that make this amazing service and program even more enticing. Five stars for version 5.
pros: Excellent core features, plus exciting new ones
Great free service, with Premium adding bonuses galore
More efficient camera and photo-uploading features
cons: Search matches found in images aren't highlighted as they are in other Evernote apps

customer_reviews.title: Every device need its Evernote
customer_reviews.text: My Fire7 is no exception at all. works well and love the dark mode
customer_reviews.author: Philip M A

customer_reviews.title: great app.
customer_reviews.text: its so much more than a organized or a note taking app. you can put in anything, and i mean anything in your note and it syncs across your devices, currently using on WindowsPhone 8 and Android 4.0 and works like a charm. In fact I use this more than One Note.
customer_reviews.author: legend-ary!

customer_reviews.title: Great Package
customer_reviews.text: I use this package across several devices for both work and personal use. Customer service is excellent too. When I had an issue with the renewal of my subscription they responded very quickly and extended the subscription temporarily while they investigated the problem so I wouldn't lose my service. Thoroughly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth Powell

customer_reviews.title: Evernote
customer_reviews.text: The more I use it the more useful it becomes. It provides a means of keeping an online archive that can be accessed from all my devices, storing not only notes and documents but also software installation programs. As for the screen grabbing - that has been a boon!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Adams

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: It's a great app, it collates all of my online research, add notes and keep research safe and sound. you can upgrade and this adds pin protection which to me is worth the fee alone. It's also joined my PC and iPad to my kindle fire, all i do is save bookmarks to evernote and they're available everywhere. Genius.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pullinger, Lord of Westhay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Complements Goggle's Keep. Evernote is essential for catalogueing and structuring complex material from many sources.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this app
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this app to everyone. I make all my notes on it and its so easy to use. It has so many good features on it , including the fact you can add photos . It also has spell check on it which is awesome. Love this app so much , Its been so helpful :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant app
customer_reviews.text: This is my favourite app ever. I find it is easy to use and indispensable for helping me to remember passwords, websites and small snippets of information that is helpful in both my personal and professional life. It is great for storing research information including references and also for everyday tasks such as shopping lists. I couldn't do without it now and it saves so much space and time than handwritten notes do.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Buchan

customer_reviews.title: incredibly useful
customer_reviews.text: I use evermore across across multiple PCs, mobiles and now tablets, and it's incredibly useful to just hit the app and have access to notes whatever device I'm using. I just make basic lists and store a few pictures as reminders, but there's lots of functionality I don't make use of. If I have a criticism, it's that the app has different functionality and UI on different platforms, so it can be a bit inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: Trevski74

customer_reviews.title: A must have app for multi platform working
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for people who find themselves connected to different devices at different times. I have the program installed on 2 laptops a tablet and my phone so I can always keep my notes, addresses, to-do lists, contacts etc at hand regardless of where I am and what I'm doing. One improvement . . . an integrated calendar would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D. L. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Ever getting better!
customer_reviews.text: A great product with seem-less synchronisation between multiple devices, all my notes and reference material organised and together. Great addons to scan by mobile phone, links with email and share information with others. Useful note taker in meetings and has great searching capabilities. Also used for getting things done - tags and reminders help set and track tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Darrius

customer_reviews.title: The best information management application bar none!
customer_reviews.text: Use it on all my devices - PC, Mac, tablet and phone. Totally indispensable, couldn't imagine how I managed before I had Evernote and it just goes on getting better. Buy Premium version, you will never find a better value app.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the app. I started to use it as a gimmick but quickly started to use it for making and storing real notes. Now would be lost without it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Evernote - very handy
customer_reviews.text: I've got this on my IPhone, my Windows 7 desktop and now on my Kindle Fire HD. It performs perfectly in all three. I've cut and pasted word docs from the PC and a BA eticket from the web for reference for travel. It's brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time, great to use on my Kindle. Helps me to copy info and hold it together and to take notes. Sometimes I can have issues but they get quickly sorted and if I make a mistake and don't save it saves it for me. Thank you great app.
customer_reviews.author: Car41

customer_reviews.title: very useful app
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant for reminders and lists and notes etc. Love being able to draw on pictures using switch. Helpful to be able to access from pc on desktop too though I prefer mobile app
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Great for working on projects in multiple locations
customer_reviews.text: If you want to collect information or work with documents on any PC, mobile or tablet. This is the platform that does it for you. A Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Einstein

customer_reviews.title: Really useful App
customer_reviews.text: Have found this app to be really useful to gather together ideas and resources. I have found it useful to gather research as i have been studying. I think it has untapped potential and i look forward to exploring how to use it to best effect.
customer_reviews.author: thelma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick to find saved notes
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can either add to existing note or create a new one. The notes are kept in date order, which I have found very useful for keeping track of where I take photographs.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Welsted

customer_reviews.title: Always flashing
customer_reviews.text: A useful notes app but it seems to need constant updating, making the phone light flash green, which is pretty annoying. This also happens when a note has been uploaded even though I know it's been done as I just wrote it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of potential
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit early for me to judge the ability of this app but, potentially, it promises much. I'm looking ofrward to finding out - and using - all of its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Little

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely necessary app, its design and integration between devices make it both reliable and indispensable for anyone who likes to have notes organised
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: A really great tool for keeping on top of tasks, memos, shopping & to do lists. Life is so much easier & with my partner sharing we can see each other's notes and brainstorm ideas even if we're working in different countries.
customer_reviews.author: The Sports Physio

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't do without it
customer_reviews.text: With a kindle fire, pc, BlackBerry and laptop, this is my most used app. It really does what it says on the tin, keeping all my notes across all my devices in sync. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: doubleplusgood
customer_reviews.text: I like evernote. It was suggested to me by a friend and now I use it to keep all my poetry in one place...I also use it to store guitar tablature. It is very versatile I like evernote. It was suggested to me by a friend and now I use it to keep all my poetry in one place...I also use it to store guitar tablature. It is very versatile
customer_reviews.author: Bella Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes life/work/organisation much easier! More people should know about it!
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy to use and lovely design.
customer_reviews.text: The design and accessibility is just so beautiful. I struggle to find fault with this app. I love the personalisation and different note forms.
customer_reviews.author: CharlotteA

customer_reviews.title: The most useful app on the Kindle!
customer_reviews.text: This app is brilliant. Spend a little time learning what you can do with it and you'll soon realize that it is one of the best organisational apps you'll ever use. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Delirium

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant App
customer_reviews.text: For compiling notes towards future articles and writing the articles themselves this app is better than windows publisher. Takes time to learn to use effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Brookes

customer_reviews.title: best app in years
customer_reviews.text: I love it and use it every day. Problem is now I have so many notes I just need some time to go back, sort through them all and use them!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine 2020

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: An excellent app which works across multiple devices and has tremendous, user friendly versatility. Even if you only need a fraction of the functions, it's well worth having on all screens. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hedge Hopper

customer_reviews.title: evernote
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded this app to kindle fire hd6 about 2 hours ago but can't get it to sync with my W7 pc or Android tab
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Willett

customer_reviews.title: better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: I had heard of everyone but didn't think I would use it...but it has ended the clutter problem I had with having hundreds of bits of paper reminding me of things. Really useful app and one of my favourites.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Anna,s burbles
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of having this system on my mobile and PC so that whenever a thought hits me I can record it and not forget, so much easier than pen and paper.
customer_reviews.author: rosaline a quinney

customer_reviews.title: Great for accessing documents and pdf files
customer_reviews.text: Syncs documents and notes between different devices. Have this on my PC, my phone and now my Kindle Fire HD. Very easy to use with a nice clean layout.
customer_reviews.author: gawainthevegan

customer_reviews.title: Great wee app
customer_reviews.text: Great wee app. I don't use it to full capacity but live the wee tick boxes for when I'm out shopping!
customer_reviews.author: dolliman

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I've got Evernote downloaded across all my devices and love how ideas I have can be noted there and then but are then without any fuss, automatically available to me on my other devices. its also great for creating task lists and keeping track of what you've done. So easy to quickly create a note or copy pictures or files to your notebooks. I really wonder how I coped before I used Evernote! It's definitely a must have app.
customer_reviews.author: DeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionised my meeting note-taking!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, easy, brilliant that it uploads straight into the web. Search function is excellent. South be better if you could put a but more formatting in (e.g. change colour of text) and if you could draw a picture easily within a note in the app (the lskitch add-on doesn't work too well)
customer_reviews.author: hayleylou

customer_reviews.title: really handy wee app
customer_reviews.text: I have this on the Kindle Fire, the desktop and the mobile and I can share notes between them, update my "to do" lists and check the notes I wrote at home while on the bus to work!
customer_reviews.author: Jette Goldie

customer_reviews.title: does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Evermore is fantastic. I send things to evernote and its there on all my kit - pc, tablet, laptop and phone If I think something's worth remembering for later I put it into evermore I think it's software everyone should have!!!
customer_reviews.author: join gunne

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This app is possibly one of the best found.Several other apps can be deleted as you have most of what you want ,when planning or storing work.With this app I have planned a journey and are now in the process of planning changes to my garden,I have also stored a load of information to help me with my voluntary work as a mentor.Brilliant and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: smeth:A good app does what it says with style.worth getting hold of.

customer_reviews.title: Evernote
customer_reviews.text: Proved really useful as whatever you write is then available on all the media you use when Evernote is downloaded (ie from Kindle Fire to netbook to Laptop - good for writing notes when on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Crips

customer_reviews.title: Best note app on the market
customer_reviews.text: keeps and files anything even files and images, syncs with your devices so phone, pc and tablet all have the same data its a very flexible app and the best i have seen. its free and its ad free
customer_reviews.author: Dennyboy

customer_reviews.title: brillianterer than the rest
customer_reviews.text: Been using catch for ages but getting tired of it losing stuff Only just started using this and miles better. Very easy to use but packed full of goodies Sync feature a must have. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this app
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy wee app that syncs with all my devices which makes list making so easy! It also makes a great mini journal and great for putting in memories and little snap shots of what is happening that day, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Renton

customer_reviews.title: I love this app
customer_reviews.text: I love this app. It's really useful for capturing and storing information and I can access it from any platform. I wish something like this had existed when I was a student. But then again I wish the same about the internet and mobile phones!!
customer_reviews.author: F. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Simply great
customer_reviews.text: Evernote is the one product I can use on any platform to organise my life. It is my to do list, planner, and online storage for all my essential documents. Simply great.
customer_reviews.author: PeterL

customer_reviews.title: Evernote
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing much to dislike about this app. you make your notes and reminders whenever you want. you can put photographs on to h help you with, your reminders.
customer_reviews.author: tony mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Great,easy way to keep notes and access them quickly. The app also has a clever feature which allows you to keep difderent notebooks which I find quite handy. Overall, I recommend and I hope others who dowoad the app have as good of an experience if not better with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful app
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded this out of curiosity so glad I did,looks like a really useful tool bit like a diary but so much more, have not done much with it yet as still exploring the different uses.
customer_reviews.author: julie beal

customer_reviews.title: Love of my life.
customer_reviews.text: We've been together for as along as I can remember. And things have only ever been getting better.
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyDee

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Great app for note taking; list making; organising and sharing information! Automatically syncs to all your devices effortlessly. And it's free!
customer_reviews.author: anniebananie

customer_reviews.title: Lost notes on android.
customer_reviews.text: Evernote is just fab. I couldn't access my notes on my android phone. I downloaded Evernote and found everything I thought I'd lost. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mary Machugh

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Work encourages us to use Microsoft one note. But one note does not seem to work on all my gadgets. However Evetnote is, I have it on my laptop, my PC, my kindle and my berry. All my notes in one place and up to date. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Bean

customer_reviews.title: This will become indispensable!
customer_reviews.text: Register for an account, download to device(s) &Pc if needed & all your notes, pics & notes are pushed to everything else! Easy to use and I will upgrade in the very near future to enhance it's usefulness. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: IanC

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: An essential tool, which I now have on four machines. A quick note on Evermore is a lot more permanent than a hastily looked for scrap of paper and more widely available.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use Evernote for university and it keeps my notes perfectly organised. I especially like the ability to add tags to notes as this makes it easier for revision. The only improvement i would wish for is coloured text.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Lou

customer_reviews.title: GREAT AND SOOOO USEFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time, when i need to write down something to remember, or when i need to write down an idea! i'ts amazing. Nothing bad to say about this product. Soo easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: by Jaya29

customer_reviews.title: Super useful!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for writing stories. It's simple and syncs between the app and the website, so I don't need to bring my paper notes everywhere anymore. When I am struck with inspiration, I can just use my phone! I haven't encountered any issues myself, but I don't use any of the fancier features.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: Great store for my info
customer_reviews.text: All my important and trivial notes in one place over all my devices, brilliant I would be back to camera photos of pages if not for this.
customer_reviews.author: The Jeepster

customer_reviews.title: robbing
customer_reviews.text: Wants you to subscribe for extra storage. Was already using 34mb of my storage with the how to flick thru that you couldn't delete
customer_reviews.author: GothicGeisha

customer_reviews.title: Useful for saving clips of web info
customer_reviews.text: Very useful app. Saves clips of anything on the web. Keep all your interesting items together. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Furrytail

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casual use on all my devices
customer_reviews.text: Seamlessly shares notes and info between my Phone, Pad and PC and wife's phone & iPad. No reason not to like this versatile App
customer_reviews.author: Chewies_mum

customer_reviews.title: best app
customer_reviews.text: This, especially the sticky notes are invaluable to sync my jottings between all my devices. Brilliant, well worth it, try it now.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Evernote
customer_reviews.text: Great programe, connects with my phone, laptop and my PC. Put something in one it then appears in the others. Recommend to all
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must-have!
customer_reviews.text: I just love the versatility of this app! It enables me to keep so much useful stuff all in one easily accessible place. I really can't do without it now! :)
customer_reviews.author: OndineBlue

customer_reviews.title: essential
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't live without this app. I use it on pc and all my devices. Notes are available anywhere, anytime. It's the only service that hasn't let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Philip and Yve Clark

customer_reviews.title: a mobile filing cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I have this app on every device I own. It's like having a mobile filing cabinet with you
customer_reviews.author: cyberdoctor

customer_reviews.title: Just Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: The best note app out there. I've been using Evernote for about 4 years now and it truly is a great app, giving you the freedom to save all kinds of different notes and store them on a sizable drive. An essential app for anybody who needs to make notes and images without wanting to carry around endless pads and dictaphones.
customer_reviews.author: MJwW

customer_reviews.title: really useful app
customer_reviews.text: I find this app very useful as I also have it on my iPhone ans iPad. This means that I always have my notes handy. Give it a go - I'm sure you won't be disappointed.:-)
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. It means I can use my Kindle Fire at meetings and for other work. I would recommend this to anyone. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: rev BM Hull

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Such a comprehensive app. Useful for everything and sundry on all four of my devices. Impressive development team and website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The best app I've come across for storing essential info.
customer_reviews.author: Elayne

customer_reviews.title: quality app
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. I can save web pages for later viewing, random thoughts... so much more but i'm just learning. Very easy to use. Top app, would reccommend thoroughly
customer_reviews.author: Julie, Derry

customer_reviews.title: evernote on kindle
customer_reviews.text: I have been using evernote on the PC for a few years now and find it a great little utility. It works great on my new Kindle Fire. which is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Bentham

customer_reviews.title: A waste of
customer_reviews.text: Did not seem to work properly, so removed it very soon. A waste of space
customer_reviews.author: Alan Clark "Victim"

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get to grips with this app. Deleted it from my kindle fire and reached with notebook pro, much more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Great Business Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great Business Tool, still getting used to it, but have used it on a recent business trip to collate all the details and notes and it has been brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cave

customer_reviews.title: super great!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this app. You can take notes, voice record, attach pictures. And even email notes to clients straight from the app. The only reason I did not give it a 5 star is because I wish there was a calender alert. If there is one and I have not found it let me know please!
customer_reviews.author: knit nat

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a successful businessman
customer_reviews.text: I have just started using this app on phone and tablet, and already I am transferring loads of info from different sources. Looks great and is quite intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: A N BONNER

customer_reviews.title: very good product.
customer_reviews.text: i have this on all my devices. very good product.
customer_reviews.author: midian

customer_reviews.title: So so..
customer_reviews.text: Found this to be a bit complicated but perhaps I didn't give it enough time... .
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Attrick

customer_reviews.title: Great App
customer_reviews.text: Great App for keeping track of all those appointments and the to do notes during the day
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. M. Mcneil

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Only just downloaded it ,but so far so good. It appears to do all I need it for and probably a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Kable

customer_reviews.title: Useful and practical
customer_reviews.text: I like to write lists to remind me what's "to do" each day/week. Evernote works well for this and importantly for me is fast and responsive enough on my entry level Android phone. Add in all the other features and I'm sure I'll find loads more uses for this app.
customer_reviews.author: Ceri Williams

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: Got this because it was free Haven't used it much yet but seems easy enough Should get a lot more use out of it in the future
customer_reviews.author: judithereece

customer_reviews.title: Not compatiable with Kindle Fire?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know whether it is good or not. I could not get it downloaded to my Kindle Fire. Probably it is not compatible though I purchased it from a Kindle Fire app store.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: THE ONLY AVAILABLE MULTI FUNCTION NOTEBOOK ACCESSIBLE FROM ALL DEVISES ACROSS ALL SERVICE PLATFORMS. BLACKBERRY, ANDROID, PC, MOBILE EXTENSIONS AVAILABLE TO ENHANCE YOUR EXPERIENCE ***FREE*** Need I say more please keep up the great work. I am in love with this app
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't do without this app. It does as many things as you want it to do. It is a one stop place to store all of your information. The best thing is you can access it in all of your devices.
customer_reviews.author: E. Marriott

customer_reviews.title: excellent piece of software
customer_reviews.text: I've used Evermore for quite sometime now and its so very good for those quick notes and reminders either on phone, Kindle or lap top and it always keeps in sinc'
customer_reviews.author: mr s h cripwell

customer_reviews.title: Simple and straightforward app
customer_reviews.text: Evernote allows me to write notes even when I don't have internet access. It's also very simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have tried using on my phone, but so great to have it on my Kindle Fire. Versatile and incredibly useful.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Jarman

customer_reviews.title: Evernote - brlliant
customer_reviews.text: I don't need to list it's virtues,just buy it and start using it and see for yourself, simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Buncher

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: A well polished slick app, but I feel you need additional training to make the most of it and more ideas on how it can help you on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and I am finding it really useful
customer_reviews.author: K. Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using evernote for about six months now and find it excellent. The formatting capability makes it much more usable than the notebook which is pre-installed on iPads, whilst the cloud sharing function means I've always got access to notes even when I'm not behind a computer screen.

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-device platform
customer_reviews.text: This is a great productivity tool, although it is easy to structure the files and notes wrongly! There are also some features that I do not understand... But having a synchronised to do list across phone, kindle and laptop is great.
customer_reviews.author: C A LENNARD

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable... nearly
customer_reviews.text: It's just about the first thing I get on any new device or browser. I wish they could be talked into creating a Linux version.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Davey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its multiple uses upon all platforms are a saviour. Works great on kindle fire and i have it synced to two other phones. Every note you need wherever you are.
customer_reviews.author: Noshin

customer_reviews.title: Best multi platform notes system
customer_reviews.text: I use Evernote on every platform I use, from Mac to iPhone to Kindle HD it is one of the apps that I look for before using a new tablet or smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wray
